Carry Own Bottle

#carryownbottle


Carry Own Bottle is a small initiative to spread awareness among people to reduce the usage of disposable bottles during travel.
“Here we are making a pledge on the consumption of plastic that we will carry our own water bottle while travelling instead of buying bottled water”
